messages.message: Iâ€™m planning to make a change such that the metadata list of each record will contain only the pages contained within the record. Does anyone know if any customers rely on the metadata list containing the metadata of all pages in the document?
@Jonathan Shih I think it is used for Refiner V5 view document UI, and may be during the flow review as well
But @Kerry and @Eric Han might confirm it
Checking on refiner 5 right now. For some reason I recall the pages just being list indices, so it would lose page information
